message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1000000 to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. To make this proposition attractive, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950000. This is an exceptional chance to secure a high-quality asset at a discounted rate. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Best regards, Alice
